<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_11"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.23
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	FORM OF OPERATING AGREEMENT
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	(Summary Translation)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	This Agreement is made and entered into
	by the Parties below on
<I>
	[specify date]
</I>
	in
<I>
	[specify city]
</I>
	, People&rsquo;s Republic of China (&ldquo;
<B>
	China
</B>
	&rdquo;).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party&nbsp;A
</B>
	:
<I>
	[specify name of
	a subsidiary of SouFun Holdings Limited]
</I>
	of
<I>
	[specify address]
</I>
	;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party&nbsp;B
</B>
	:
<I>
	[specify name of
	a consolidated controlled entity]
</I>
	of
<I>
	[specify address]
</I>
	;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party&nbsp;C
</B>
	:
<I>
	[specify name of
	shareholder of Party&nbsp;B]
</I>
	of
<I>
	[specify address]
</I>
	; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party&nbsp;D
</B>
	:
<I>
	[specify name of
	shareholder of Party&nbsp;B]
</I>
	of
<I>
	[specify address]
</I>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;A
	is a wholly foreign owned enterprise established in China;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;B
	is a wholly domestically funded company registered in China, with the approval of
<I>
	[specify city]
</I>
	Administration of Industry
	and Commerce to engage in the advertising business;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;A
	and Party&nbsp;B have established a business relationship through an Exclusive Technical Consultancy and Services Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Pursuant
	to the Exclusive Technical Consultancy and Services Agreement between Party&nbsp;A and Party&nbsp;B, Party&nbsp;B shall pay Party&nbsp;A
	certain specified amounts, which have not yet been paid by Party&nbsp;B, while Party&nbsp;B&rsquo;s daily operations have a material
	effect on the ability of Party&nbsp;B to pay such remuneration to Party&nbsp;A;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;C
	is a shareholder of Party&nbsp;B, holding
<I>
	[specify percentage]
</I>
	% equity interests in Party&nbsp;B;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;D
	is a shareholder of Party&nbsp;B, holding
<I>
	[specify percentage]
</I>
	% equity interests in Party&nbsp;B; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;A,
	Party&nbsp;B, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D hereby agree to further identify matters in relation to the operation of Party&nbsp;B&rsquo;s
	business pursuant to this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, the Parties hereof
	through negotiation agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;When
	Party&nbsp;B enters into a business contract or agreement with any Third Party (&ldquo;
<B>
	Third Party
</B>
	&rdquo;) and is in line
	with the relevant terms and conditions hereunder, Party&nbsp;A hereby agrees that it shall sign, with such Third Party upon its
	request, a written agreement to be the performance guarantor of Party&nbsp;B by furnishing complete guaranty for Party&nbsp;B&rsquo;s
	performance under such contract or agreement in order to ensure the normal operation of Party&nbsp;B&rsquo;s business. As counter
	security, Party&nbsp;B hereby agrees that it shall mortgage to Party&nbsp;A its accounts receivable and all of its assets.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage283"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	accordance with the provisions of Article&nbsp;1 and in order to guarantee the performance of all business agreements, including
	the Exclusive Technical Consultancy and Services Agreement, between Party&nbsp;A and Party&nbsp;B, and the disbursement of all
	accounts payable by Party&nbsp;B to Party&nbsp;A under the Exclusive Technical Consultancy and Services Agreement, Party&nbsp;B
	and its shareholders, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D, hereby agree that Party&nbsp;B, without the prior written consent of Party&nbsp;A
	or its designee, shall not engage in any transaction that may materially affect the assets, obligations, rights and operations
	of Party&nbsp;B, including but not limited to the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;borrowing
	money or undertaking any obligation from any Third Party;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	2.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;selling
	to or acquiring from any Third Party any assets or rights, including but not limited to any intellectual property rights;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	2.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;providing
	security with the title of its assets or intellectual property rights for the benefit of any Third Party; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	2.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Transferring
	rights and obligations herein to any Third Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	order to guarantee the performance of all business agreements, including the Exclusive Technical Consultancy and Services Agreement,
	between Party&nbsp;A and Party&nbsp;B, and the payment of all accounts payable by Party&nbsp;B to Party&nbsp;A under the Exclusive
	Technical Consultancy and Services Agreement, Party&nbsp;B and its shareholders, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D, hereby agree to
	accept company policies and instructions provided by Party&nbsp;A from time to time on the employment and termination of working
	staff, daily operations and management, and financial management systems and other similar policies.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;B
	and its shareholders, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D, hereby agree that Party&nbsp;B, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D shall appoint
	the persons designated by Party&nbsp;A to be the directors of Party&nbsp;B, and senior management personnel employed by, and as
	designated by, Party&nbsp;A to be the general manager, chief financial officer and other senior management personnel of Party&nbsp;B.
	If the aforesaid directors or senior management personnel designated by Party&nbsp;A leave Party&nbsp;A, regardless of whether
	they resign or are dismissed by Party&nbsp;A, such persons shall lose the qualification of being in charge of any post of Party&nbsp;B.
	Under such circumstances, Party&nbsp;B, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D shall appoint other senior management personnel designated
	by Party&nbsp;A to assume such posts.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;C
	and Party&nbsp;D hereby agree that they shall, concurrently with the execution this Agreement, execute a corresponding Shareholders&rsquo;
	Proxy Agreement under which Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D shall authorize and entrust Party&nbsp;A or a person designated by Party&nbsp;A
	to exercise any and all shareholders&rsquo; rights of Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D to vote pursuant to provisions of laws and
	Party&nbsp;B&rsquo;s Articles of Association.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	2
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	-
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage284"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party&nbsp;B
	and its shareholders, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D, hereby agree and confirm that, apart from the agreed provisions in Article&nbsp;1
	herein, if Party&nbsp;B is in need of any other guaranty for Party&nbsp;B&rsquo;s performance or security for borrowing to finance
	its working capital, it shall first seek guaranty or security from Party&nbsp;A. Under such circumstances, Party&nbsp;A is entitled
	to decide whether to furnish proper guaranty or security for Party&nbsp;B based on Party&nbsp;A&rsquo;s own judgment. If Party&nbsp;A
	decides not to furnish such guaranty or security for Party&nbsp;B, it shall notify Party&nbsp;B in writing in time, and thereafter,
	Party&nbsp;B can seek guaranty or security from any Third Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Party A hereby agrees and confirms that,
	in case that Party B experiences substantial loss in its business and operation, Party A shall provide capital support or other
	types of financial support as reasonably requested by Party B. Details of the type and plan of the financial support shall be determined
	through consultation between Party A and Party B based on the actual situation of Party B.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	case of the termination or expiry of any agreement between Party&nbsp;A and Party&nbsp;B, Party&nbsp;A is entitled, but not obligated,
	to terminate all other agreements between Party&nbsp;A and Party&nbsp;B, including but not limited to the Exclusive Technical Consultancy
	and Services Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Amendments
	and supplements to this Agreement shall be made in writing. Such amendments and supplements properly signed by the Parties shall
	constitute an integral part of this Agreement with the same validity.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	Agreement shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the PRC law, excluding, for purposes of this Agreement, the laws
	of Taiwan, the Hong Kong Special Administration Region or the Macau Special Administration Region.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Dispute
	Settlement
</U>
	. Any dispute arising from the interpretation of or the performance of the terms and conditions hereunder shall be
	settled through bona fide negotiations. If such dispute cannot be so settled, it may be submitted by any Party&nbsp;to the China
	International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission and arbitrated in Beijing, China pursuant to the current arbitration rules.
	The language for arbitration will be Chinese. The arbitration award shall be accepted as final and binding upon the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	11.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Notice
</U>
	.
	Any notice or other communication sent by any Party&nbsp;shall be written in Chinese, and sent by mail or facsimile transmission
	to the addresses of the other Parties set forth below or to other designated addresses previously notified by any such other Party.
	If any Party&nbsp;changes its address, it shall notify the other Parties of such change in a timely and effective manner. The dates
	on which such notices are deemed to have been effectively given shall be determined as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices
	given by personal delivery shall be deemed effectively given on the date of personal delivery;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices
	sent by registered airmail (postage prepaid) shall be deemed effectively given on the seventh (7
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	) day after the date
	on which they were mailed (as indicated by the postmark);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	(C)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices
	sent by a courier recognized by the Parties shall be deemed effectively given on the third (3
<SUP>
	rd
</SUP>
	) day after they were
	sent to such courier service agency; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
</P>

	as indicated on the document.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	12.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	Agreement shall come into force upon signature by authorized representatives of the Parties hereof on the date contained at the
	beginning. This Agreement shall remain valid for ten (10) years unless it is terminated in advance pursuant to the terms and conditions
	hereunder. Party&nbsp;B, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D hereby agree that the term of this Agreement, upon Party&nbsp;A&rsquo;s
	confirmation before termination, can be extended to a date designated in Party&nbsp;A&rsquo;s written confirmation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	13.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	Agreement shall be terminated on the expiry date unless validity of the terms and conditions concerned herein is extended. During
	the term, Party&nbsp;B, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D shall not terminate this Agreement. Notwithstanding the above, Party&nbsp;A
	can terminate this Agreement at any time by notifying Party&nbsp;B, Party&nbsp;C and Party&nbsp;D in writing thirty (30) days in
	advance.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

	Agreement shall be binding upon each Party&rsquo;s successors and transferees permitted under this Agreement in the same effect
	as if they were contracting parties to this Agreement.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.23.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	SCHEDULE OF OPERATING AGREEMENTS AMONG
	CERTAIN PRC SUBSIDIARY OF SOUFUN
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	HOLDING LIMITED, A CONSOLIDATED CONTROLLED
	ENTITY AND SHAREHOLDERS OF
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	THE CONSOLIDATED CONTROLLED ENTITY
</B>
</P>

<A NAME="V436073_EX4-24_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_13"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;4.24
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	FORM OF EXCLUSIVE TECHNICAL CONSULTANCY
	AND
<BR>
	SERVICES AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	(Summary Translation)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	This Exclusive Technical Consultancy and
	Services Agreement (this &ldquo;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) is made and entered into by the Parties below on [
<I>
	specify date
</I>
	]
	in [
<I>
	specify city
</I>
	], People&rsquo;s Republic of China (&ldquo;
<B>
	China
</B>
	&rdquo;):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Party
	A
</B>
</FONT>
	: [
<I>
	specify name of a subsidiary of SouFun Holdings Limited
</I>
	] of [
<I>
	specify address
</I>
	].
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Party
	B
</B>
</FONT>
	: [
<I>
	specify name of a consolidated controlled entity
</I>
	] of [
<I>
	specify address
</I>
	].
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
</FONT>
	:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	A is a wholly foreign owned enterprise registered and established on [
<I>
	specify date
</I>
	] in [
<I>
	specify city
</I>
	] and engages
	in [
<I>
	specify business scope in business license
</I>
	];
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	B is a domestically funded enterprise registered and established on [
<I>
	specify date
</I>
	] in [
<I>
	specify city
</I>
	] and, as approved
	by [
<I>
	specify city
</I>
	] Industry and Commerce Administration, is authorized to engage in [
<I>
	specify business scope in business
	license
</I>
	]; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(3)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	A hereby agrees to provide technical consulting and related services to Party B, and Party B agrees to accept such consulting and
	related services.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Party A and Party B are hereinafter each
	referred to as a &ldquo;
<B>
	Party
</B>
	&rdquo; and, collectively, the &ldquo;
<B>
	Parties
</B>
	.&rdquo;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	NOW,
	THEREFORE
</B>
</FONT>
	, both Parties hereof through negotiations on the principle of equality agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Technical
	Consulting and Related Services
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;During
	the term of this Agreement, Party A, as a provider of technical consulting and related services, hereby agrees to provide Party
	B with the technical consulting and related services specified in Schedule I under the terms and conditions contained herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	B hereby agrees to accept such technical consulting and related services provided by Party A. Party B further agrees that it shall
	not, without the prior written consent of Party A, accept the aforesaid technical consulting and related services
</FONT>
	provided
	by any third party not a Party hereto during the term of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Exclusive
	Rights
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
	and all rights, ownership interests and intellectual property rights including but not limited to copyrights, patents, technical
	know-how and trade secrets, no matter whether developed by Party A, or developed by Party B based on Party A&rsquo;s intellectual
	property rights or services provided by Party A, shall be the exclusive property of Party A.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Fee
	for Technical Consulting and Related Services
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	3.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	B hereby agrees to calculate and pay the fees for the technical consulting and related services arising hereunder (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Consulting
	and Services Fee
</B>
	&rdquo;) pursuant to the method specified in Schedule II.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Guaranty
	for the Performance of this Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	order to guarantee Party B&rsquo;s payment to Party A of the Consulting and Services Fee, [
<I>
	specify name of shareholder of Party
	B
</I>
	] and [
<I>
	specify name of additional shareholder of Party B
</I>
	], as shareholders of Party B, are willing to pledge their
	equity interests in Party B to Party A
</FONT>
	or Party A&rsquo;s affiliate and to sign a separate Equity Pledge Agreement with
	Party A or Party A&rsquo;s affiliate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Effectiveness
	and Term
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	5.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	Agreement shall come into force upon its execution on the date first written above.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	5.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	Agreement shall remain valid for ten (10) years.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	5.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	B hereby agrees that the term of this agreement shall be extended automatically for another ten (10) years unless Party A sends
	to Party B a written notice terminating this Agreement within six (6) months prior to the expiry date of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	6.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	Agreement shall terminate on the expiry date unless it is terminated in advance in accordance with Article&nbsp;6.2 hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	6.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;During
	the term hereof, Party B may not terminate this Agreement prior to its expiry date unless any act of Party A constitutes a gross
	negligence, a violation of law, bankruptcy or a material breach of this Agreement. Party A, however, is entitled to terminate this
	Agreement at any time provided that it notifies Party B in writing thirty (30) days in advance.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Representations
	and Warranties
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	7.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	A hereby represents and warrants as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	7.1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	A is a company duly registered and validly existing under the PRC law.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	7.1.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	A has taken the necessary corporate actions and any other necessary steps to acquire the authorization to execute and perform this
	Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
</P>

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	7.1.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	execution and performance of this Agreement or observance of the terms and provisions hereof by Party A shall not:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 2IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 2IN">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;violate
	any law, regulation, rule, court order, judgment, finding, ban or mandate of government; or
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 2IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 2IN">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be
	in conflict with or contradict any term, provision, condition or prescription under any agreement, contract or document of Party
	B, restrict Party B&rsquo;s actions, or result in a breach of the aforesaid terms, provisions, conditions or prescriptions.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	7.1.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	Agreement, upon its execution, shall be legal, valid and binding upon Party A and shall be enforceable in accordance with the terms
	and conditions herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	7.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	B hereby represents and warrants as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	7.2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	B is a company duly registered and validly existing under the PRC law and is authorized to engage in the advertising business.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	7.2.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	B has taken the necessary corporate actions and any other necessary steps to acquire the authorization to execute and perform this
	Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	7.2.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	execution and performance of this Agreement and the observance of the terms and provisions hereunder by Party B shall not:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 2IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 2IN">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;violate
	any law, regulation, rule, court order, judgment, finding, ban or mandate of government; or
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 2IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 2IN">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be
	in conflict with or contradiction to any term, provision, condition or prescription under any agreement, contract or document of
	Party B or restrict Party B&rsquo;s actions, or result in a breach of the aforesaid terms, provisions, conditions or prescriptions.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	7.2.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	Agreement, upon its execution, shall be legal, valid and binding upon Party B and shall be enforceable in accordance with the terms
	and conditions herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Taxation
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	8.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All
	taxes arising out of a Party&rsquo;s performance of this Agreement shall be born by such Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Confidentiality
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	9.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
	Party hereby agrees that it shall make every endeavor and take all reasonable measures to keep confidential the other Party&rsquo;s
	confidential materials and information (&ldquo;Confidential Information&rdquo;) known or acquired by such Party due to the entry
	into and performance of this Agreement. Without prior written consent of the owner of the aforesaid Confidential Information, the
	other Party shall not divulge, grant or transfer to any third party such Confidential Information. Upon the termination of this
	Agreement, such Party shall return to the owner of such Confidential Information upon its request, or destroy any documents, materials,
	software or other sources carrying such Confidential Information, delete any such Confidential Information from any memory device
	and shall cease using such Confidential Information.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage292"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	9.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Both
	Parties hereby agree that this article shall remain valid no matter whether this Agreement is amended, cancelled or terminated.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Indemnification
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	10.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
	Party shall indemnify the other Party for, and hold the other Party harmless against, any loss, damage, obligation or expense resulting
	from any litigation, claim or other request to the other Party which occurs or arises out of the other Party&rsquo;s performance
	of its obligations under this Agreement and any of its business contracts.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	11.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Governing
	Laws and Dispute Resolution
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	11.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	PRC law shall govern the execution, validity, interpretation, amendment, termination and resolution of disputes arising out of
	this Agreement. The PRC law referred to herein does not include the laws of Taiwan, the Hong Kong Special Administration Region
	or the Macau Special Administration Region.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	11.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
	dispute arising from or related to this Agreement shall be settled first through friendly negotiations. If such dispute cannot
	be settled within thirty (30) days after the start of negotiations, it shall be submitted to the China International Economic and
	Trade Arbitration Commission for arbitration and be arbitrated in Beijing, China in accordance with its arbitration rules when
	such arbitration application was submitted. The arbitral award shall be final and binding upon all Parties. Unless otherwise decided
	by the arbitration commission, arbitration fees and other expenses in relation to such arbitration shall be borne by the losing
	Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	12.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Force
	Majeure
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	12.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&ldquo;Force
	majeure&rdquo; means any unforeseeable circumstance which is beyond the control of a Party, or any unavoidable event, even if foreseeable,
	as a result of which such Party is unable to perform its obligations, in whole or in part, under this Agreement. Such circumstances
	include, but are not limited to, any strike, factory closure, explosion, maritime peril, natural disaster, act by a public enemy,
	fire, flood, accident, war, riot, insurgence or any other similar event.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	12.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Should
	the affected Party be prevented from performing its obligations hereunder due to any force majeure event, the aforesaid obligations
	shall be suspended during the continuation of such force majeure event, and the time for performing such obligations shall be extended
	automatically until the force majeure event ends. The affected Party shall not be liable for its non-performance during the force
	majeure event.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	12.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
	Party encountering a force majeure event shall forthwith notify the other Parties in writing and supply proper evidence of the
	inception of the force majeure event and its continuing period. Such Party shall make every reasonable endeavor to mitigate the
	damages of such event of force majeure.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
</P>

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	12.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	a force majeure event occurs, the Parties shall forthwith negotiate a fair solution, and shall make any and all reasonable efforts
	to minimize the effects of any event of force majeure.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	12.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	the force majeure event lasts over ninety (90) days and the Parties do not reach any agreement on a just solution, any of the Parties
	shall be entitled to terminate this Agreement. In case of termination of this Agreement pursuant to the aforesaid provision, none
	of the Parties shall have any rights or obligations subsequent thereto, but the rights and obligations of each Party arising hereunder
	before such termination shall not be affected.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	13.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Miscellaneous
	Terms
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	13.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Notice
</B>
	.
	Any notice or other communication sent by any Party shall be written in Chinese, and sent by mail or facsimile transmission to
	the addresses of the other Parties set forth below or to other designated addresses previously notified by any such other Party.
	If any Party changes its address, it shall notify the other Parties of such change in a timely and effective manner. The dates
	on which such notices are deemed to have been effectively given shall be determined as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices
	given by personal delivery shall be deemed effectively given on the date of personal delivery;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices
	sent by registered airmail (postage prepaid) shall be deemed effectively given on the seventh (7th) day after the date on which
	they were mailed (as indicated by the postmark);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	(C)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices
	sent by a courier recognized by the Parties shall be deemed effectively given on the third (3rd) day after they were sent to such
	courier service agency; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
	(D)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices
	sent by facsimile transmission shall be deemed effectively given on the first business day following the date of transmission,
	as indicated on the document.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Party A:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
<BR>
	Address:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
<BR>
	Fax:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
<BR>
	Tel: :
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
<BR>
	Attention:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Party B:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
<BR>
	Address:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
<BR>
	Fax:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
<BR>
	Tel:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
<BR>
	Attention:
<I>
	[specify]
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
</P>

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	13.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Non-implied
	Waiver
</B>
	. The failure of one Party to exercise its rights to investigate the breach of the other Party under a special circumstance
	shall not be deemed as a waiver of such rights in other similar cases.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	13.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Severability
</B>
	.
	If any provision or portion of this Agreement is determined to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, or in conflict with public
	interests under any applicable PRC laws, the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions hereunder shall
	not in any way be affected or impaired. Both Parties shall negotiate sincerely to reach an agreement to replace the invalid provision
	with a provision satisfactory to both Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	13.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Non-transfer
</B>
	.
	Without the prior written consent of the other Party, one Party may not transfer this Agreement or any rights or obligations hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	13.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Counterparts
</B>
	.
	This Agreement is made in Chinese. This Agreement and any amendment hereto may be executed in counterparts. Either Party may sign
	one copy and send such copy by facsimile transmission to the other Party, but shall forthwith send the original one. All signed
	documents shall constitute one agreement, which shall come into force after both Parties sign one or more documents and send them
	to the other Party hereof (unless otherwise provided in the original of such documents).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	13.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Amendment
</B>
	.
	This Agreement can be amended only upon execution of a written document by both Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 3.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Schedule I: Content of Technical
	Consulting and Related Services
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Party A shall provide Party B with the following
	consulting and related services:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	[
<I>
	specify the services
</I>
	]
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 7; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Schedule II: Mode of Calculation
	and Payment of the Consulting and Services Fees
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Fees
	for consulting and related services to be charged by Party A from Party B shall be calculated as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;According
	to the time for services provided to Party B by Party A&rsquo;s technical personnel during normal working hours. The fees for services
	by Party A&rsquo;s employees will be calculated as the sum of the products of each person&rsquo;s rate at their respective level
	and the number of hours worked; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Both
	Parties hereby agree to negotiate separately about the charging standards of the services not contained in (1) provided by Party
	A.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	The Consulting and Services Fee to be paid
	by Party B shall comprise the fees in the foregoing (1) and (2).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party
	A shall notify Party B, prior to the fifth day of each month, with respect to the Consulting and Services Fees for the prior month,
	and Party B shall, within two (2) days after receiving such notice, pay the whole amount of the aforesaid Fee to an account designated
	by Party&nbsp;A.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>

	SCHEDULE OF EXCLUSIVE TECHNICAL CONSULTANCY
	AND SERVICES AGREEMENTS BETWEEN
</B>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	CERTAIN PRC SUBSIDIARY OF SOUFUN HOLDINGS
	LIMITED AND A CONSOLIDATED CONTROLLED ENTITY
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</B>

</B>

</TD>

</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD NOWRAP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; WIDTH: 1%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
